Entries.1{{YearRemainder}}: Hi, {{Title}} @! Did you know that when cows are happy, they make a purring sound? Almost like cats!
Entries.2{{YearRemainder}}: Miss Maru showed us a crazy science experiment. She set her hand on fire and it didn't burn!
Entries.3{{YearRemainder}}: Auntie Marnie says I'm learning lots from Miss Penny.

Entries.2_2: Miss Penny has been teaching us grammar! Like how to use "has been".$h
